name: Name: Zhaoyu Wang

skillsList.brief: Java (Proficient), Python (Proficient), C (Familiar), MATLAB, SQL, HTML, Pandas
TensorFlow, PyTorch, MyBatis, GAMS, Transformer Models, LLM

educationList.school: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
educationList.degree: Bachelor of Management + Bachelor of Science

internships.name: Level 3 AI, Singapore
internships.brief: Developed AI customer service solutions for multiple companies, designed and implemented the required chat databases, and deeply engaged in the development of related algorithms and workflows within the project.

internships.name: Dolby, Beijing
internships.brief: Contributed to the pHRTF project by collecting ear datasets, designing neural networks, and conducting data analysis.

internships.name: Beijing ZX-CE Technology Co., Ltd.
internships.brief: Designed the user interface for a WeChat Mini Program for a coffee shop and participated in search engine optimization analysis.

internships.name: Pattern Recognition and Intelligent Systems Laboratory (Beijing)
internships.brief: Researched cross-modal person re-identification methods, completed data preprocessing, and implemented model visualization.

detailOne: Developed AI chatbots for GetGo and Webuy, maintaining a customer satisfaction rate of over 90% while improving containment rate from 39% to 55%.
detailTwo: Optimized Webuy's room pricing algorithm, significantly enhancing pricing efficiency and accuracy.
detailThree: Built a public demonstration database by acquiring data through API integrations and web scraping, and developed an AI-driven booking assistant powered by large language models.
detailFour: Established early-stage data monitoring dashboards for two companies, deploying systems with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and PostgreSQL to ensure reliability and scalability; later created standardized metric monitoring dashboards using Metabase.
detailFive: Implemented automated data pipelines using Prefect, enabling seamless data retrieval from production environments and generating comprehensive reports through integrated analytics modules.
videoWarning: Your browser does not support video playback.
detailSix: Participated in the personal head-related transfer function (pHRTF) project, participated the localization of ear dataset collection and designing neural networks for ear detection.
detailSeven: Deployed Stable Diffusion WebUI on Linux to experiment with generative AI, expanding datasets and improving accuracy by 4%.
detailEight: Enhanced ear datasets using CycleGAN, covering scenarios such as wearing headphones and earrings, thereby improving the diversity of training data.
detailNine: Developed scripts to test the pHRTF APK, evaluated the robustness of ear detection networks across different devices, and generated visualized reports.
detailTen: Created a database management system using Flask, Vue, and MySQL to support data statistics and downloads, accelerating the acquisition of data required by the development team.

projects.name: China Food Delivery System
projects.brief: A food delivery system based on Vue and Spring Boot, implementing features such as user registration, login, food browsing, shopping cart, and order management.

projects.name: Distributed Treasure Hunt Game
projects.brief: A decentralized distributed treasure hunt game utilizing Java RMI to implement a decentralized registry. The system dynamically determines the primary and backup servers through an election mechanism, ensuring fault tolerance and high availability.

projects.name: Evaluation of Automatic Differentiation in Machine Learning
projects.brief: Implemented gradient computation for GANs using MATLAB and PyTorch, comparing the efficiency and generative performance of automatic differentiation, manual differentiation, and numerical differentiation.

projects.name: MIT Exchange Program: Computer Vision
projects.brief: Learned computer vision and machine learning concepts, applied transfer learning using ResNet50, and implemented matching between real shoe images and sketches.

projects.name: 3D Data Augmentation Methods for Person Re-Identification
projects.brief: Used the SMPL model to convert 2D portraits into 3D, evaluated the authenticity of 3D parameters with GANs, and resolved data insufficiency issues through 3D pose transformations.

projects.name: Smart Home Management System
projects.brief: Developed a RESTful smart home management system, improved data query efficiency with MyBatis and MySQL, and built the user interface using Vue.js.
